document.full_text: a u.s. federal jury found that a bone drug made by novartis pharmaceuticals corp was not to blame for the severe jaw deterioration developed by a rhode island man who died of cancer in 2005.
document.title: u.s. jury finds novartis not liable for jaw disease
lines_and_colors: a u.s. federal jury found that a bone drug made by novartis pharmaceuticals corp was not to blame for the severe jaw deterioration developed by a rhode island man who died of cancer in 2005.
